title: Facebook : monthly brand profile follower growth 2017
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth rate for 5 number of Months.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
The difference of Growth rate between the highest and lowest Month is 3.18.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Growth rate in each Month on the y axis.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth rate for 5 number of Months.
The Growth rate is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
The difference of Growth rate between the highest and lowest Month is 3.18.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Growth rate for 5 number of Months.
The Growth rate is highest at Month Sep '17 and lowest at Month Nov '17.
The minimum Month Nov '17 has got 32.8 times less Growth rate than the maximum Month Sep '17.
The Month Sep '17 has the highest Growth rate, followed by Aug '17, and Dec '17. Down to the Month Nov '17 which is the lowest.
The Growth rate has climbed over the past 5 Months.
Month Nov '17, and Oct '17 have the same Growth rate.
The Month Nov '17 has 3.34 times less Growth rate than average.
The Growth rate is 4.91 if we add up values of all Months.
